wyrm_hint_1.content: Old miners speak of tremors deep beneath the eastern mountains... as if something immense slumbers there.

wyrm_hint_2.content: The Prophecy of Scales: 'When the child of fire gathers the scales of their ancestors, the ancient one shall stir.'

wyrm_hint_3.content: Massive claw marks scar the cave walls, each groove large enough to fit a person.

wyrm_hint_4.content: The hidden passage opens when you present the complete set of dragon scales at the altar.

shadow_hint_1.content: They say a throne of pure darkness exists where no light can reach...

champion_hint_1.content: Journal of Sir Aldric: 'I seek the ultimate test of my skill. If I fail, may the knights who follow free my spirit.'

void_hint_1.content: Scholars whisper of a gateway that exists between dimensions, accessible only to those who have mastered all puzzles.

primordial_hint_1.content: Ancient Text: 'When the four elemental shrines align, the primal force awakens in the grove of origins.'

mirror_hint_1.content: Legends speak of a Mirror of Truth that reflects not your image, but your very essence...
